definition[0]: a funny drawing of someone that makes them look silly
definition[1]: a description of someone or something that is only partly true and makes them seem silly
example[1]: The report presents a caricature of the true situation.
definition[2]: the activity of drawing or writing caricatures
definition[3]: to draw or describe someone or something in a way that makes them seem silly
example[2]: Scientists are often caricatured as absent-minded professors.
